anomalies.description: Multiple failed login attempts detected - manual review required.
Manual investigation initiated by fraud analyst.

risk_factors: Failed login from new device in different region/country
Manual investigation required to verify user identity
risk_assessment.summary: Manual analysis required: User had successful login from US followed by failed login from India on new device. Investigator should verify user activity and device ownership.

splunk_data.manual_notes: Regular user device - verified in previous investigations
New device from India - requires manual verification

manual_investigation.analyst_notes: Geographic inconsistency detected - user login from US followed by India access attempt
verification_steps: Contact user to verify India travel
Verify user identity through additional authentication
